titleInfo.title: Nelson Taylor and Robert "Bob" Taylor perform A Tribute To Jimmie Rodgers

mods.abstract: Robert "Bob" Taylor and his father Nelson Taylor perform 'A Tribute To Jimmie Rodgers' to the tune of Those Gambler's Blues.
